data.name: DOA6 Honoka: Makeover School Uniform Costume
data.detailed_description:
Bonus costume for Honoka for the owners of Season Pass 2.

■ Note:
- You must have the latest update installed before using this content.
- You must purchase the character before using this content.
data.about_the_game:
Bonus costume for Honoka for the owners of Season Pass 2.

■ Note:
- You must have the latest update installed before using this content.
- You must purchase the character before using this content.
data.short_description: Bonus costume for Honoka for the owners of Season Pass 2.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 （64bit）
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 or over
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 or over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 （64bit）
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 8700 or over
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 or over
